statements: SELECT * FROM health_data;
SELECT user_id, heart_rate FROM health_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, steps_count FROM health_data WHERE steps_count > 10000;
SELECT user_id, calories_burned, sleep_duration FROM health_data WHERE calories_burned > 500 AND sleep_duration < 8;
SELECT user_id, heart_rate, calories_burned FROM health_data ORDER BY heart_rate DESC;
SELECT user_id, heart_rate, steps_count, calories_burned, sleep_duration FROM health_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM health_data WHERE heart_rate > 80 AND calories_burned < 500;
SELECT user_id, steps_count, sleep_duration FROM health_data ORDER BY steps_count DESC;
SELECT user_id, heart_rate FROM health_data WHERE calories_burned >= 300 AND sleep_duration <= 6;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, calories_burned FROM health_data WHERE steps_count > 10000;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM health_data WHERE steps > 10000 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT data_id, date, heart_rate FROM health_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, gender FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT user_id, username, age, gender FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT username, age, gender FROM users WHERE gender = 'FEMALE' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT username, MAX(heart_rate) AS max_heart_rate FROM health_data GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(data_id) AS data_count FROM health_data GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(data_id) > 10;
SELECT username, age, heart_rate, steps FROM users JOIN health_data ON users.user_id = health_data.user_id WHERE steps > 10000 ORDER BY steps DESC;
SELECT * FROM wearable_devices;
SELECT brand, device_type FROM wearable_devices WHERE device_type = 'Smart Watch';
SELECT user_id, device_type, brand FROM wearable_devices ORDER BY brand ASC;
SELECT * FROM health_data WHERE steps > 10000;
SELECT user_id, recommendation FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 'a2b726f4-4f81-43e9-b3db-4f1e09c242ad';
SELECT * FROM wearable_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_type, brand FROM wearable_devices WHERE brand = 'Fitbit';
SELECT user_id, device_type, brand, created_at FROM wearable_devices WHERE device_type = 'Smart Watch' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM health_data WHERE heart_rate > 80 AND steps > 10000 ORDER BY recorded_at ASC;
SELECT user_id, recommendation FROM recommendations WHERE suggested_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY suggested_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM health_data;
SELECT user_id, heart_rate FROM health_data WHERE steps_count > 10000;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM user_profile WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT model, brand FROM device_info ORDER BY brand ASC;
SELECT user_id, recommendation_text, recommendation_time FROM recommendation WHERE recommendation_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM health_data WHERE heart_rate > 80 ORDER BY heart_rate DESC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(steps_count) AS max_steps FROM health_data GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM user_profile WHERE gender = 'female';
SELECT * FROM device_info WHERE brand = 'Apple' AND firmware_version LIKE '1.%';
SELECT r.user_id, r.recommendation_text, u.first_name, u.last_name FROM recommendation r INNER JOIN user_profile u ON r.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY r.recommendation_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, name, age FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, name, gender FROM users WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT user_id, height, weight FROM users WHERE height > 170;
SELECT user_id, name, activity_type, calories_burned FROM user_activities ORDER BY calories_burned DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, name, height FROM users JOIN user_health_data ON users.user_id = user_health_data.user_id WHERE step_count > 10000 ORDER BY height ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, start_time, end_time FROM user_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Running' AND calories_burned > 500 ORDER BY start_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_recommendations WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY user_id, timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, preference_type, value FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_type IN ('diet', 'exercise') ORDER BY user_id, preference_type ASC LIMIT 5;
